cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: In this Xperience by Kentico Technical Spotlight you can learn how, in just a couple of minutes, you can be developing solutions with Xperience by Kentico.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Technical Spotlight #1: Getting started with Xperience by Kentico!
